info.name: Hide left MediaWiki panel
info.description: Until you hover the left margin, this style hides the left navigation panel. It also centers the main content on a wiki page powered by MediaWiki, see Disclaimer below for exceptions. Also, when you make the panel show up (by hovering the left margin), it gets a background color so that its contents are still visible even if they overlap with something else.
info.additionalInfo:
Disclaimer - Wikis can appear in a lot of different layouts, called Skins. Because of this, not every wiki powered by MediaWiki even has a left panel to begin with, so in some of them this style might not work. - I can't make this style match all wikis. The match system works by matching URL's and a wiki can have any; matching any URL with "wiki" in it can catch sites that are not wikis, e.g. wikileaks.org, or even sites that do not use MediaWiki, which I don't plan on supporting. If you want to have a wiki supported, send feedback below, I'll then see if the style works on said wiki and add it to the list. Changelog
